document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">lifetime </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">guess </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">times </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">ache </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Confess </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">times </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">sake </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">brave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eyes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">film </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">guess </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">guessing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hurts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">get </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">dim! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">vague </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">patient </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">covets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">strength </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">timidness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">enfolds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Haunting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">translated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">faces </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Teazing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">want </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">suffice! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: You see I cannot see your lifetime
